# delegate

**Instance Property**

The delegate of the text-formatting coordinator.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var delegate: (any UITextFormattingCoordinatorDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Applying Updated Text Attributes

- **UITextFormattingCoordinatorDelegate**: The methods that delegates of text-formatting coordinators implement to apply font panel settings to the currently selected text.
